text: The men's 400 metres hurdles event at the 1991 Summer Universiade was held at the Don Valley Stadium in Sheffield on 23 and 24 July 1991. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Derrick Adkins '''' |Yoshihiko Saito '''' |Oleg Tverdokhleb '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== Heats results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;font-size:95%" |- !
